mapper.sql: sensor_id sensorId, sensor_threshold sensorThreshold, alia_name aliaName, state, alarm_time alarmTime,alarm_type alarmType
mapper.select: select t.sensor_id sensorId, t.sensor_threshold sensorThreshold, t.alia_name aliaName, t.state, t.alarm_time alarmTime, t.alarm_type alarmType, s.group_name groupName, s.device_name deviceName, s.sensor_name sensorName, s.state sensorState from mo_net_sensor_threshold t left join mo_net_sensor s on t.sensor_id = s.sensor_id
mapper.insert: insert into mo_net_sensor_threshold (sensor_id, sensor_threshold, alia_name, state, alarm_time,alarm_type) values (#{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sensorThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{aliaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR)

insert into mo_net_sensor_threshold
sensor_id,
sensor_threshold,
alia_name,
state,
alarm_time,
alarm_type,
#{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sensorThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{aliaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update mo_net_sensor_threshold set sensor_threshold = #{sensorThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, alia_name = #{aliaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alarm_type = #{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
